# How do I unlock Premium features?

  • Boost theSupport Serveropen in new window, for every boost you will get 2 Months Tier 1 Premium or 1 Month Tier 2 Premium
  • 1 Vote = 1 Credits (%vote)open in new window ****
  • Premium Tier 1 = 19 Credits for 2 Months
  • Premium Tier 2 = 19 Credits for 1 Month
  • Support our Partner CustomBot Studion on Patreonopen in new window => Premium Tier 1/2 + Your own Discord Bot (Custom Bot)
  • By further questions, join the Support Server or Dm Meister#9667open in new window

# Enable the Feature:

  • Custom Remind Avatar, Thumbnail, Icon, Footer, Image
  • Channelstatus
  • Channel lockdown on Bump (%chstat lock enable/disable)
  • Custom Embed Colors (%embedcolor <hex_color>)
  • Additional Counting Plugin Features(Addrole..)
  • QOTD Ping (%qsetup ping @role)
  • Boost Tracker
  • Welcomer
  • Your own custom Discord Bot (%custombot)

Click on the link to get the documentation for the feature!
